subject: AW: Order #SSN1660 confirmed
description_text: Hello, Today a package of my order (Carbon Fiber Heel Plate) arrived but the VAM Pro Set is missing, if it should come separately I am missing the tracking number can you please check this. Thanks in advance. Best regards D. Pätzold Von: SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> Gesendet: 05.06.2025 15:38 An: <depaz14@arcor.de> Betreff: Order #SSN1660 confirmed SIMSONN Order #SSN1660 Thank you for your purchase! We're getting your order ready to be shipped. We will notify you when it has been sent. View your order or Visit our store Order summary Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback × 1 VAM Pro Set (2 pac/includes power supply) $107.90 Carbon Fiber Heel Plate × 1 $27.90 Subtotal $135.80 Order discount -$20.37 SN15 (-$20.37) Shipping $9.90 Taxes $23.82 Total $149.15 USD You saved $20.37 Customer information Shipping address Detlef Pätzold Südring 14 76473 Iffezheim Germany Billing address Detlef Pätzold Südring 14 76473 Iffezheim Germany Payment Paypal Shipping method Economy Shipping If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: Hello, the Tracking-No. SF6045775261394 does not return any results. It ist also impossible to log in using the Ticket code. Can you please clarify this. Thanks in advance. A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours). To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/567?follow=email Thank you for your patience. Hi Depaz14,     Sorry, the logistics provider said they missed this parcel in the warehouse, it has been dispatched for you urgently, there will be a logistics update soon, please keep an eye on it, it is expected to arrive for you around No.
Hello, and now? ...where is the update? It can't be that they only ever respond to my emails without any real progress on the matter.
Hi Depaz14,     Here's a link to your logistics tracking, which is expected to arrive for you around the 3rd.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045775261394
Hi Depaz14,     If your PC headset keeps having issues, I recommend purchasing an inexpensive ADUM3160 USB isolator. It should help you resolve the problem physically in a simple way.
Hi Depaz14,  Apologies, I sent this email by mistake. Please disregard it, and thank you.
